definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: When coral bleaches, seaweed can grow out of control, stifling reef recovery.
sentences.chinese: 珊瑚白化以後，海草便不受控制的瘋長起來。

sentences.english: A dugong forages in the seagrass meadows of Shark Bay, Western Australia.
sentences.chinese: 圖爲在西澳洲鯊魚灣的海草中覓食的儒艮。

sentences.english: Sushi made with seaweed tends to be a little higher in sodium, as is the soy sauce that each piece is dipped in.
sentences.chinese: 用海草做的壽司鈉含量挺高的，就像用醬油浸過一樣。

sentences.english: Seagrasses are the only flowering plants that can live entirely in water.
sentences.chinese: 海草是開花植物中唯一能生長在水中的。

sentences.english: In recent years, seagrass ecosystem in China has been degraded seriously.
sentences.chinese: 近年來，中國海草生態系統受到嚴重破壞。

sentences.english: The bun is light and toasty , even though it began life as seaweed.
sentences.chinese: 包子既輕又好喫，雖然它開始生長的時候是海草。

sentences.english: A seaweedreleases acid for defense when it's injured.
sentences.chinese: 海草在受傷時釋放酸液來自衛。

sentences.english: We now know that about one fourth of all the kinds of seaweed are animals.
sentences.chinese: 現在我們知道各種海草中大工業約有四分之一是動物。

sentences.english: Seagrasses are flowering plants found in shallow waters.
sentences.chinese: 海草是一種生長在淺水中的開花植物。

sentences.english: s. Dried seaweed, called “nori”, is a popular food in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 幹海草，被稱爲海苔，是日本人的流行食品。

sentences.english: Strong clonality has essential influences on genetic variation of seagrasses.
sentences.chinese: 強烈的克隆性影響着海草的遺傳變異。

sentences.english: During this time the male avoids open water and hides in sea grass .
sentences.chinese: 在此期間雄海馬防止袋中進水並隱藏在海草中。

sentences.english: The wrack had begun to stink as it rotted in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 漂積海草在陽光下腐爛，開始變臭了。

sentences.english: The leaves swayed back and forth in the wind, reminding Jordi of seaweed drifting in the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 一片片綠葉在風中搖曳，讓喬迪想起海上飄浮的海草。

sentences.english: Groves of seaweeds sway beautifully along with the flowing water.
sentences.chinese: 海底叢叢的海草隨着湖水搖曳生姿。

sentences.english: The Sargasso sea , a free-floating mass of sea weed mostly S.
sentences.chinese: 位於大西洋的馬尾藻海上就漂浮着大量的海草。

definition: shell/conch/cowry/mother of pearl/hard outer skin/also pr. [bei4 qiao4]
water plants/habitat with water source and grass
shallow sea/sea less than 200 meters deep
